title: Test: using the Realme P4 Power as a power bank for your iPhone
desc: The Realme P4 Power has a 10,001mAh battery, which is the capacity of a typical power bank. But how good is it at actually charging other phones?

title: Texas special election will narrow Republicans’ US House majority even more
desc: Voters on Saturday will select one of two Democrats in a runoff election to fill a vacant US House seat, further narrowing Speaker Mike Johnson’s already razor-thin Republican majority.

title: Cuddle up with Heartopia's My Little Pony collab this Valentine's Day
desc: The Heartopia x My Little Pony collab offers quests, costumes, collections and outfits, so it's safe to say that I'm ready.

title: Artemis 2 wet dress rehearsal livestream: Watch the rocket test live
desc: Here's how to watch NASA's wet dress rehearsal, a pivotal fueling test of the Space Launch System, before the launch of Artemis 2.

title: This Minneapolis family has been in hiding for weeks, fearful of being deported
desc: MINNEAPOLIS — A south Minneapolis mother cried as she watched her daughter get ready for high school graduation.

title: He Witnessed an Earlier Shooting. Feds Arrested Him at the Scene of Alex Pretti’s Killing
desc: A man who contradicted the government narrative about a prior shooting found himself pinned to the ground and detained after Alex Pretti’s death.

title: The Islamic centre selling Hezbollah trinkets in the heart of London
desc: Charity suspected of being an outpost of the Iranian regime under investigation over stalls pushing ‘terrorist tat’

title: Seven foods you should be eating more of right now

title: Fresh Air Weekend: Novelists Liz Moore and Julian Barnes
desc: Moore, the author of The God of the Woods, describes the rare "flow state" of writing. Maureen Corrigan reviews Vigil, by George Saunders. Barnes says Departure(s) will be his last book.

title: Bella Ysmael returns to pageantry as Miss Universe Philippines Taguig
